content:
# Factorio Report

## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Stone Furnace Array
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace (position x1) and stone furnace (position y1)
- Stone furnace (position x2) and stone furnace (position y2)

### Coal and Iron Ore Input System
Consists of the following entities:
- Inserter (position a) that puts coal into the first stone furnace
- Inserter (position b) that puts iron ore into the first stone furnace
- Inserter (position c) that puts iron ore into the second stone furnace

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting to place. 

### Repeated actions without change
- Avoid repeating the same actions (like inserting into furnaces) without checking if it is necessary. This can lead to inefficiencies in resource management.
